description: The precocious young Komachi is http://anidb.net/ch3961 [Kirara]`s younger sister. Upon hearing that her older sister would be journeying into the city to seek out samurai, Komachi virtually forces herself into the search party. She is a bundle of energy, being highly active, and also the kind to never be afraid to ask any question to any person. Overall, she is blunt in a charming, childish way.
name: Komachi
